name: Defender
text: Attach Defender to 1 of your Pokémon. At the end of your opponent's next turn, discard Defender. Damage done to that Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

effect.text: Attach Defender to 1 of your Pokémon. At the end of your opponent's next turn, discard Defender. Damage done to that Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

competitiveHistory: Defender was used to help key Pokemon survive crucial turns, especially to protect setup Pokemon or extend the life of attackers.

rulings.ruling: Defender reduces damage after Weakness and Resistance are calculated.
Defender is discarded at the end of your opponent's next turn.
Multiple Defenders can be attached to the same Pokemon for stacking reduction.
